item.title: RAGBRAI XLVIII Recap
item.description: < fig src=“images/pxl_20210727_174939767.jpeg” caption=“Knolling my RAGBRAI packlist” alt=“My RAGBRAI packlist laid out for display” > I just got back from another year of RAGBRAI.

item.title: RAGBRAI XLV (2017) Pack List
item.description: < fig src=“images/IMG_0789-rotate.jpeg” caption=“Knolling my RAGBRAI packlist” alt=“My RAGBRAI packlist laid out for display” > I have been on RAGBRAI (Des Moines Register’s Annual Great Bike Ride Across Iowa) several times since 2005.
